thread.title: Festival News | The day-by-day breakdown for this weekend's Indiependence festival
thread.title_full: Festival News | The day-by-day breakdown for this weekend's Indiependence festival - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Festival News | The day-by-day breakdown for this weekend's Indiependence festival
text:
The day-by-day breakdown has been announced for this weekend's Indiependence festival.
If you're heading to Mitchelstown this weekend, you're going to be in need of this at some point.
Whether you're heading for a single day, or taking on the mammoth task of three days camping, you're going to need a breakdown of the stages and times if you want to catch your favourite bands.
Lucky for you they've announced all the necessary details, so you don't have to worry about anything other than packing your entire wardrobe into one bag.
If you're feeling peckish when your down there, keep an eye out for the Hula Hoops promo team . As part of their "Fun Never Grows Up" campaign, they'll be spreading some Hula Hoops happiness by giving out free Hula Hoops, the crispy kind, and letting you have a go off some Hula Hoops, the not so crispy kind.
Look out for their custom built Hoop-la-Stall and dancing Hula-Hoop Girls , who'll be showing you how it's done as well as giving you a chance to win some deadly prizes with their Hoop-La Challenges!
MORE: Hula Hoops have something pretty special lined up for this summer's festivals
MORE: Watch: Kodaline chat about being starstruck by Susan Boyle ahead of Indiependence festival
MORE: Basement Jaxx and Kodaline announced as Indiependence festival headliners
